title: Lanka will reveal the truth and expose Report’s falsity – President Mahinda Rajapaksa
content: ‘We will present the world with our achievements on bringing normalcy and peace to Sri Lanka, bring to light the factual position about this country and thereby expose the falsity of the controversial Darusman Report, President Mahinda Rajapaksa said yesterday. Speaking to local newspaper Editors at a breakfast meeting at Temple Trees the President said…
